name: eu vou
description: This is a tribute to Caetano Veloso, a brazilian musician who is now 78 years old. He's one of the artists who was exiled during the military dictatorship of Brazil, in addition to being tortured and persecuted for his resistance to the regime. At that time, Caetano was part of the cultural movement “Tropicália”, which included artists from the music scene, the plastic arts and cinema. Here's a thank you to all the artists who took the risk to spread hope in such a dark time. @hunconscious
